articles.description: They sent Steve Stanulis a cease and desist letter.
articles.content:
Kim Kardashian and Kanye West have taken legal action against West’s former bodyguard who described the rapper as the “neediest, moodiest and worst tipper.”

articles.title: Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively, Who Had Their Wedding on a Plantation, Donate $200,000 to the NAACP - Newsweek
articles.description: "We want to use our privilege and platform to be an ally," the couple said in a statement.
articles.content:
Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively have made a $200,000 donation to the NAACP legal defense fund amid criticism for previously having their wedding on a former plantation.
